category_descriptions.Granulated Onion: Coarsely ground dehydrated onion products with specific mesh sizes, often used as intermediate processing forms.
category_descriptions.Toasted And Roasted Onion Products: Dehydrated onion products that have undergone additional thermal processing for enhanced flavor.
category_descriptions.Chopped And Minced Onion: Dehydrated onion pieces in chopped, minced, or flaked form, typically used in food preparation.
category_descriptions.Onion Powder: Finely ground dehydrated onion products used as a seasoning or ingredient base.
